modName: Real Road Patch For Tamriel Reloaded HD
summary: A Simple Patch That Allows Real Road's Meshes To Work with Tamriel Reloaded's New Textures
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]Attention: This mod is no longer being supported or updated.[/size]

This mod has been uploaded by "The Care Taker" at the request of its owner. The Care Taker account is run by Nexus Mods for the purpose of hosting mods created by authors who are no longer active in the community.

If you are a mod author and would like to learn more about this service or have questions, you can find details regarding The Care Taker [url=https://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/5792517-the-care-taker/]HERE[/url].

Happy modding![/color][/b][/center]

[size=4]I'll keep this short and sweet because the mod is the same. This is a simple plugin I made for my latest playthrough. Thought i'd share so other people can benefit. 

[u]What is this:[/u] A Patch that allows [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518/?]Real Road[/url]'s meshes to work with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/?]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url]. You still need both mods. This is just a simple patch that makes them play nice together.

[u]How to install:[/u] Download Mod with mod manager. Install. Activate Mod. Load [b]AFTER [/b][u]Tamriel Reloaded HD.esp[/u] and [u]Real Roads.esp[/u].

[u]Issues:[/u] (Hopefully) None. The plugin is super simple, so it shouldn't conflict with anything. 

[u]Merging:[/u] If you need to, you can merge this plugin with Tamriel Reloaded HD.esp. Make sure this plugin OVERWRITES Tamriel Reloaded HD.esp. I still recommend to load it after Real Roads.esp. 

That's all. Enjoy. 
[/size]
author: steveowashere

files.name: Real Roads and Tamriel Reloaded Patch
